## LeagueManager class

A league manager - to fetch and manage all summoner competitive info.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LeagueManager implements BaseManager<Collection<string, LeagueEntry>> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;Collection&lt;string, [LeagueEntry](./shieldbow.leagueentry.md)

|  [client](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager belongs to. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(id, options)](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetch a summoner's competitive info by the summoner's ID. |
|  [fetchByLeagueId(leagueId)](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.fetchbyleagueid.md) |  | Fetch the league entries by a league ID. |
